Uses of Class
Transaction

  • Uses of Transaction in Unnamed Package

    Subclasses of Transaction in Unnamed Package
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BalanceInquiry
    Retrieves the available and total balances of an account and displays them on the screen.
    class 
    Deposit
    Deposits amount in cash or cheque, into the account.
    class 
    Withdrawal
    Tracks and enables a withdrawal transaction at an ATM by:
    - Checking the amount available for withdrawal
    - Checking if the cash was dispensed
    - Dispensing the cash
    - Checking if the ATM has sufficient cash to dispense
